glsa.title: Open DC Hub: Remote code execution
glsa.synopsis: Open DC Hub contains a buffer overflow that can be exploited to allow remote code execution.

background.p: Open DC Hub is the hub software for the Direct Connect file sharing network.

description.p: Donato Ferrante discovered a buffer overflow vulnerability in the RedirectAll command of the Open DC Hub.

impact.p: Upon exploitation, a remote user with administrative privileges can execute arbitrary code on the system running the Open DC Hub.

workaround.p: Only give administrative rights to trusted users.

resolution.p: All Open DC Hub users should upgrade to the latest version:
